text: Wahbi Khazri (; born 8 February 1991 in Ajaccio) is a Tunisian professional football player who currently plays for Sunderland and the Tunisia national team. He plays as a midfielder and a winger. He has also played for SC Bastia, Girondins de Bordeaux, and Stade Rennais. He played in the 2018 FIFA World Cup for Tunisia, and he scored two goals. == Career statistics == Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Team Season League League League Domestic Cup Domestic Cup League Cup League Cup Europe Europe Total Total Team Season Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Bastia 2008–09 Ligue 2 12 3 0 0 0 0 — — 12 3 Bastia 2009–10 Ligue 2 31 2 0 0 1 0 — — 32 2 Bastia 2010–11 Championnat National 34 4 0 0 4 1 — — 38 5 Bastia 2011–12 Ligue 2 33 9 2 1 0 0 — — 35 10 Bastia 2012–13 Ligue 1 29 7 0 0 3 0 — — 32 7 Bastia 2013–14 Ligue 1 32 6 1 1 1 0 — — 34 7 Bastia Total Total 171 31 3 2 9 1 0 0 183 34 Bordeaux 2014–15 Ligue 1 32 9 1 0 1 0 — — 34 9 Bordeaux 2015–16 Ligue 1 20 5 1 0 1 0 8Appearances in the Europa League 1 30 6 Bordeaux Total Total 52 14 2 0 2 0 8 1 64 15 Sunderland 2015–16 Premier League 14 2 0 0 0 0 — — 14 2 Sunderland 2016–17 Premier League 21 1 0 0 2 0 — — 23 1 Sunderland 2017–18 Championship 3 0 0 0 2 0 — — 5 0 Sunderland Total Total 38 3 0 0 4 0 0 0 42 3 Rennes (loan) 2017–18 Ligue 1 24 9 1 0 4 2 — — 29 11 Career total Career total Career total 285 57 6 2 19 3 8 1 318 63 == References == == Other websites == * LFP Profile * Wahbi Khazri at Soccerway.com Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Tunisian footballers Category:Premier League players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:2018 FIFA World Cup players Category:2022 FIFA World Cup players
